title: 820-00840 no POST
message:
Hi guys,

Got an 820-00840 that I got for new screen (usual flexgate problem)

Noticed that machine has a 'cold boot' issue where it randomly powers off or restarts during use, especially when cold booting. First few times it struggles to even get to login screen.

After a warm up period is seems far less frequent.

Having opened her up, noticed a very small amout of corrosion around U7370 and L8030 / Q8030.

Have flux and boiled these 2 spots, but now board is stuck at 20v 0.03A. Trackpad clicks when plugged in but CPU does not get warm.

I have checked and have no VCORE voltage present at L7210/20.

From reading other threads I have noticed that L8060 and L7900 seem to have lower than expected resistance in diode mode (0.036v and 0.086v)

Any suggestions?

title: 820-00840 no POST
message:
Something went wrong when you rework mentioned areas.

You cannot search VCORE with only 30mA on USB port; many more voltages missing.
Do you get 3V3_S5 at least (L7690)?

title: 820-00840 no POST
message:
Worth mentioning after a short while current increases and settles at 0.05A.

I'm getting S0 rails too both 3V3 and 5V

title: 820-00840 no POST
message: Post the coils where you get voltage...

title: 820-00840 no POST
message:
L7960 voltage must appear before CPU core.
Post diode mode to ground at this coil; switch to ohm mode, if very low value.

title: 820-00840 no POST
message:
Post basic voltages for U7800 (6 OF 10); VINVR5, ENVR5.
Check R7908/9 and R/C7907.
